page.title: 07W.CHILTINGTON VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content: At the{VILLAGE FAIR}there was a show for pedigree and mongrel dogs and fun games. The first class started at 2.00 and ended about 4.00. There were twister,apple bobbing,bun eating and a dog dressing-up races. { W.CHILTINGTON FLOWER SHOW "I was very excited about my mark,and to see what other people had made. I entered a decorated paper plate and made toffees. I won a lot of races at the flower show. There were flowers in unusual vases like a tea-pot or a gnome. There were quite a lot of beautiful bouquets on display." { W.CHILTINGTON SCHOOL FAIR The fancy dress was in the middle of the school field. A clown came first, then a genie was second and a ring master was third.Last of all Miss West, the Headmistress, was put in the stocks and wet sponges thrown at her!
